CustomField.description: Field is created to image status of approval process.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Approved') , IMAGE("/resource/StatusImages/thumbs-up.png", "Accepted", 20, 20), IF ( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Rejected'), IMAGE("/resource/StatusImages/thumbs-down.png", "Rejected", 20, 20), IMAGE("/resource/StatusImages/draft.png", "In Approval", 20, 20)))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Field is created to image status of approval process.
CustomField.label: Status Indicator
